xgui
Interface xiPanelItem

All Known Implementing Classes:
xHisto, xInfo, xMeter, xRate, xState
public interface xiPanelItem

JPanel items to be placed into xPanelGraphics.

See Also:
xPanelGraphics

setActionListener

void setActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener actionlistener)
Parameters:
